title: Event Horizon
review: I've reviewed this before, but I felt like watching it again because it's so entertaining. It's dumb fun inspired by Alien (in the natural way the crew chat as they wake up), and Hellraiser (in the monster design and lore). There's cool 90s music, effects and costumes. The set is really cool, and I love it when a movie is set in one location where you can memorise the layout (E.g. No Exit, Climax, The Hateful Eight). In a way this is shallow and a slight waste of the cool demonic sci-fi idea, but I like it and had fun during my second watch.
